Introduction¶

Welcome to the world of process control!

Computer control is becoming more and more critical to ensure the smooth operation of almost all processes. This library contains a handfull of control algorithms, each of which can be used for a wide range of applications. It has been written with simplicity in mind so as to ensure it caters for both those with little to no knowlegde, and those of whom have a wide range of experience in the field.

Potential applications range from simple PID motor control with an arduino to fully fledged dynamic matrix control of an industrial rig. Excuse the pun... but your in control.
